phrases: I just overheard some girls in middle school talking by our school gate.
High's image is starting to change, do not you think?
And I mean, before, the air here used to be sick.
We must have really changed, then.
I am sure we will get a lot more new girls coming in.
I am glad we have good representatives in the council this term.
Besides, next week is an open house for seniors in junior high.
If we keep working the way we do now, the ratio of girls in Seika will increase!
I see more suggestions from the girls than from boys.
Plenty of doodles from the boys, too.
It is gotten lot better, but we still have a mountain of work to do.
Okay, first we will distribute the work amongst us.
Then we will make priorities to-
Can I borrow a towel and a drier?
Um, if it is a towel...
You can use mine if you do not mind.
I thought I might use it during PE today,
But I did not in the end.
Does he think I am dangerous?
Be conscious of what you do a little, you perv!
So, how did you end up like that?
You always brag about your strength.
This is so tight, no one's going to be able to open it.
Could someone do something about this stuck faucet?
Maybe Usui-san will do something about it.
I will go take a look at it.
I will be using it on every corner of my body.
Like here, there, and over there, too.
You are supposed to look grossed out.
So, moving on to the next agenda item.
Regarding the budget for next week's open house.
I cannot find the accounting notebook...
It was with me until a moment ago!
Hey, has anyone seen the notebook-
You have got nerves to be sleeping in the middle of a meeting.
But Prez... I cannot keep my eyes open...
You have not written anything about today's meeting!
I have not had to correct people's clothing in a while, too.
How rare to see you late.
What was wrong with me this morning?
I cannot find the Accounting Notebook anywhere.
I reconstructed as much as possible from memory.
It is not accurate, but hold on to that until you find the original.
You wrote all this based on your memory?
You even have yesterday's note summarized.
Yeah, since the secretary was useless yesterday.
Is not this the list of who used the Infirmary?
Should you be throwing this away?
He is always so diligent when it comes to his duties.
He would never make this kind of mistake.
Also, Kataya from this morning and Kosugi from yesterday.
He is still wearing a blazer.
You are a student council member, right?
Maybe they are having a broadcasting test?
It really puts people to sleep.
Hey, what is this broadcast about?
Did you catch a cold or something?
Are you performing a broadcasting test?
Then could you change the music?
This tune makes me really sleepy.
It relaxes people and put them in like an intoxicated state.
This actually works more on smart people like you.
And you are very honest when you are not alert.
You are the heart of the Student Council.
I will now have you make a complete fool out of yourself in front of the teacher, to the point where you will never regain your position.
We do not need any more girls at Seika.
You were sleeping in the broadcasting room, so I brought you over to the infirmary.
You are here to kisss Yukimura again, are not youu?
Youu go secshually harassing people too much!
She cannot hold a conversation, can she?
Does not smell like you had any alcohol.
I alwaysh thought it would be more spiky.
I do not see any drunken student.
Are you sure you saw one?
I am sorry to trouble you.
I am betting you will not believe me no matter what I tell you when you wake up.
Do not be so depressed, Prez.
To the future Prez on the other side of the screen.
So, what should I do about this?
Prez, do not tell me you are about to take your clothes off.
Are you trying to seduce me?
Hey, why is there a rope here?
Youu thought I would say shomething like that, you perverted bashtard!
This goes far beyond being open, Ayuzawa.
It is time to go to bed, Milady.
It was really hot today, was not it?
Hot ramen's the best on days like these, is not it?
She is been like that since this morning.
It is got to be a dream.
I want to believe that it is all a dream.
So did you meet someone in the broadcasting room?
I did go to the broadcasting room.
I think you were hypnotized there.
Someone who does not like you tried to get you into a nasty looking situation.
Thank you, Yukimura, for the wonderful cross dressing.
You cannot handle girls at all, huh,
Looks like you have an interesting trick.
Would you take a look at it?
I will put in some extra effort.
Do not take your eyes off me.
Do not take your eyes off me.
Prez left the room a bit ago.
She was looking through this year's class photos until she left.
She dashed out saying, It is him!
I have been told, Kanou, that you do not like girls.
Is that why you tried to ruin me?
If I would fall from my position, the number of girls would not increase.
That is what you thought, right?
I will not give up my position!
I will increase the number of girls!
Because I believe that is the path Seika should take now that it is a coed school.
But if you have something to say, I will listen.
If you have trouble with the school life, I will work to make it better.
That is part of my work.
Tell me what is on your mind.
I know this is strange coming from me, but you should be aware that you are very easily hypnotized.
Prez will come to hate Usui-senpai.
If she sleeps in the next 24 hours, as in between now and tomorrow at 5:00pm,
when she wakes up, you will become the person she detests most.
Looks like it is the end of the best partnership.
You huge huge huge idiot Misa-chan!
That is a new way of greeting her.
You are not asked to work here today.
I cannot be away from you at a time like this.
I am not letting you sleep at all tonight.
Do not say such a misleading phrase.
It is finally over, is not it?
I want to get changed and go home, you know?
Then I will help you get changed.
How far are you going to follow me?
Do you realize that you are gross?
Why did Kanou put this kind of hypnosis on me?
I already hate you, so I do not understand the point.
It must be that Kanou does not see it that way.
So his eyes cannot see the truth.
Let me ask one more time, Usui.
How far are you going to follow me?
Just a minute until I call a cop.
You are satisfied now, are not you?!
What happened today was due to my total lack of caution!
I will reflect on it through the night, so do not bother me!
Your cell phone's been ringing constantly.
Maybe a mail in prize I sent out under your name won?
Yo, yo, it is me, it is me, you know?
Did you win the cafe au lait set?
I do not need swindlers, thank you.
TLnote: Misaki refers to It is me, it is me Swinder scams in Japan in which callers impersonate people to extract money.
Why do you know my number?
Do you know how many times have you have called me so far?
It is the 22nd time, you stalker!
I thought you would get sleepy if you kept on just studying.
Staying up a whole night is child's play for me.
Besides I hate you to begin with, so-
Who would love an idiot like him?
I just do not want to lose to Kanou, who is only trying to manipulate people.
It says it will rain in the afternoon.
You want to share an umbrella?
Do not read people's morning newspapers!
But I had nothing better to do.
Were you out here the entire night?
Oh, so a long lost brother returns.
Here, let us have our breakfast.
You have not eaten anything, right?
I will seriously call a cop next time, alright?
This is past the expiration date.
If you have got problem with it, then do not eat it!
It is starting to come down.
My eyes are starting to go hazy.
Is it because I stayed up all night?
I have to carry these sorts of things around.
I might have left it in the classroom.
I can tell that you really need to keep it with you.
Yukimura looks like a health nut, does not he?
So you really are not sleepy yet?
I already told you it is child's play!
Hey, is not that supposed to be chewed on?
Is not it like a blueberry flavored tablet candy?
Yukimura, what does this box look like to you?
When you went to go get this, did you meet a guy with a hood and glasses on?
Prez, do you know the side effect of this pain killer?
I will never forgive him now.
You have less than an hour to go.
Damn, why am I so sleepy?
Probably because you are not used to taking meds.
I would rather cure it myself than rely on it!
I cannot get any work done.
I am going to get some fresh air.
I have got a request for you.
If you punch me, I think my anger and hatred towards you will blow my fatigue away.
Also, let me punch you back.
That will make me feel even more energized.
You are being more unreasonable than usual, Prez.
There is no way I could punch you.
You always box yourself in, you know?
You should have waited for me to come.
Why should I wait for you just to have a talk with Kanou?
Hypnosis never works unless the recipient trusts the one doing it.
That is why I will never be hypnotized.
I do not want you to hate me.
There you go, saying things like that.
But, I am a little grateful to you.
Will I forget this sort of feeling, too?
Like for the sports festival, and for Miyabigaoka.
Oh, and for the school festival, too.
I have not properly said thank you yet.
I will come save you as many times as needed.
I will make you fall for me as many times as needed.
Leave it all to your Master.
Oh, this is Yukimura, the vice president.
This is Kataya, the disciplinary officer who was a little crazy today.
This is Sawa, the accountant who lost the notebook.
I am Kosugi, the secretary who was totally sleepy.
I am Aramaki, the PE rep who went to hold the Prez back.
I am Utsume, the Cleaning Rep who is always afraid of the Prez.
I am Hagimoto, the broadcasting rep who worked hard during the sports fest!
I barely get to talk, but I am Hayase, the Health Rep.
Let us all work together and get ready for the open house!
